title: Strategies for Utilizing Large Language Models in Physical Education: A Collaborative Design Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational theories and practical experience in physical education, basic digital literacy
context.additional_context: A course for current physical education practitioners to acquire lesson design and learner interaction strategies using large language models in a mobile environment

learning_goals: Learners can draft and review physical education lesson plans using large language models.
Learners can evaluate the safety and appropriateness of generated content using three criteria: accuracy, clarity, and contextual relevance.
Learners can apply two practical strategies—resource integration and iterative feedback—to maximize synergy between teachers and AI.

resources: Access Permissions for Large Language Models (e.g., ChatGPT)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
